brief.content-text: The diagram depicts the use of traffic filtering. There is a circle with an internal network inside; the internal network contains four hosts connected to a switch. The switch is connected to a router which connects the internal network to external networks. The router is receiving four external packets. The packets labeled HTTP Protocol and Network 172.16.0.0 are allowed access into the network. The packets labeled IP Address 192.168.1.5 and Telnet are being blocked from accessing the network. The internal network uses MAC Address filtering. One of the four hosts is blocked from using the network.
